EmailTemplate.name: RE: Follow Up (1347049692.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Follow Up (1347049692.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Carl, Thank you for your follow up. I checked around and we do not have an official enterprise relationship with Ann Taylor, so I will be your primary point of contact here. I would like to set up a time for us to speak so I am able to walk you through the program and answer any questions you may have. You may select a time by going to my online schedule <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCVlBet0hh4vm5JaTsljmOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. I look forward to speaking with you soon. Have a great weekend,Nicolette From: Carl Wood [mailto:carlwood54@yahoo.com] Sent: Thursday, September 06, 2012 11:02 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: Follow Up Hi, sorry for the delay. The client is Ann Taylor. -Carl Wood From: Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com>; To: carlwood54@yahoo.com <carlwood54@yahoo.com>; Subject: Follow Up Sent: Fri, Aug 31, 2012 6:06:50 PM Hi Carl, Thank you for taking my call today. As I mentioned on the phone, depending on who the client is that referred you I may not be the person within MBO you will speak with. If you could please let me know who your client would be and I will route you accordingly. If it turns out I will be your contact I will send you a follow up email with a link to my calendar for you to schedule a convenient time for us to speak. Thank you so much and have a great weekend!Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <javascript:return> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
